snippet: ROGOW--Nina. The Yiddish Theatrical Alliance mourns the passing of our beloved member Nina Rogow. Koved ir ondenk. May her memory be blessed. Corey Breier, President 1/3...
lead_paragraph: ROGOW--Nina. The Yiddish Theatrical Alliance mourns the passing of our beloved member Nina Rogow. Koved ir ondenk. May her memory be blessed. Corey Breier, President 1/3
